idea-plugin.name: Fluid Accessibility Linter
idea-plugin.description:
Advanced accessibility linter for TYPO3 Fluid templates with rule-based architecture. Version 2.0 - Architectural Improvements:
  • Rule-based architecture with configurable validation strategies
  • Modular fix system with strategy pattern
  • Eliminated code duplication through composition
  • Improved separation of concerns
  • Extensible rule engine for easy addition of new checks
Accessibility Checks:
  • Image accessibility (alt text, decorative images, SVG support)
  • Form validation (labels, fieldsets, placeholder patterns)
  • Heading hierarchy and structure
  • List semantics and structure
  • ARIA attributes and roles
  • Table accessibility
  • Navigation and skip links
  • Interactive components (modals, accordions, tabs)
  • Live regions and announcements
  • Language attributes
  • Fluid ViewHelper specific validations
